programme.title: Mother Tongue: The Other Side of History
programme.desc:
Documentary series investigating Canada's multicultural history from a female perspective.
Année : 1992

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 2000. Single mother and obstinate research assistant Erin Brockovich works for a small time California attorney when she uncovers evidence to sue the irresponsible state utility.
Année : 1992
Réalisation : Steven Soderbergh
Avec : Julia Roberts Albert Finney Aaron Eckhart

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S10EP33) Chris Vallée learns about the safety and accessibility updates of Ottawa's E-Scooter Rental Program. Then, Alex Smyth explores the Canadian Foundation for Physically Disabled Persons' program.
Année : 1992

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP33) On accueille Martin Deschamps, pour nous parler de sa nouvelle émission, en compagnie de la productrice Isabelle Maréchal.. On parle d'un nouveau traitement potentiel contre la DMLA.
Année : 1992

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
NDP MPP Taras Natyshak and Conservative MP Dave Epp explore possible solutions to the problems faced by migrant workers in Southwestern Ontario, including COVID-19 outbreaks and living conditions that some critics call inhumane.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Non-binary performance artist Susan Williams adores theatre. Their latest show, Illegally Blind, is based on their experience living with Visual Snow Syndrome - a rare form of blindness.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP13) Over 6 feet tall at just 13 years old, Milly manages the rare condition Marfan Syndrome, while grieving the loss of her mum to bowel cancer.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Join Alex Smyth as he heads to the Yukon region to explore the history.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S09EP34) Alex Smyth learns about Izzy Camilleri, and how her adaptive fashion line is making a difference for those who need it. Then, Beth Deer meets Shannon Crossland, who is using her huge social media influence to share a positive message.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S10EP33) Chris Vallée learns about the safety and accessibility updates of Ottawa's E-Scooter Rental Program. Then, Alex Smyth explores the Canadian Foundation for Physically Disabled Persons' program.
Année : 2011

programme.title: No Vacancy: Vancouver Housing Crisis
programme.desc:
Host Grant Hardy investigates the impact of Metro Vancouver's housing crisis on people with disabilities and how it is challenging city planners, architects and governments. Grant also reveals solutions being tested to help address the crisis.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Evening the Odds
programme.desc:
Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Teenager Mac Denniston nearly lost his life in a mountain bike accident. The crash left him with a Traumatic Brain Injury, but 18 months on he's making remarkable progress.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dr Huhana Hickey is a key figure in the disability community. She's organising a hikoi to seek a better future for the next generation - and marking her life story with a moko kauae.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Le champ des rêves
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1989. An Iowa farmer hears a voice telling him to build a baseball diamond in the middle of his corn field.
Année : 2011
Réalisation : P.A. Robinson Phil Alden Robinson
Avec : Kevin Costner Amy Madigan James Earl Jones

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP08) Taylor became a parapalegic after an injury training as a gymnast. She has built up an online tea brand with impressive results. With the opening of her first café imminent, she has questions for the mentors.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Best of Now With Dave Brown
programme.desc:
(S04EP15) Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, entertainment, sports and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Best of Kelly and Ramya
programme.desc:
(S01EP15) Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc:
(S01EP08) Mark collects Christmas toys for the needy, which leads to an uncomfortable discovery about one of his classmates. Meanwhile, Pop's prodigal son shows up.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Mr.D
programme.desc:
(S07EP11) Using Xavier Academy as its sample, an investigative reporting team sets out to determine the true value of the private school system. the team instead exposes Xavier's deepest and darkest secret: Gerry Duncan.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S16EP06) While investigating a murder in a tight-lipped Mennonite colony, Murdoch and Ogden don plain clothing and go undercover.
Année : 2008
